item.title: Laravel Nepal Rastra Bank Forex Api
item.description: Laravel NrbForexApi The sachinkiranti/nrb-forex-api package provides easy access to the forex rate fixed by Nepal Rastra Bank for different countries to Nepali Rupees(NPR). Installation Installation is straightforward, setup is similar to every other Laravel Packages. 1. Install via Composer Begin by pulling in the package through Composer: 1 composer require sachinkiranti/nrb-forex-api 2. Define the Service Provider and alias Note: This package supports the new auto discovery features of Laravel >=5.
